detaileddescription.para:
prepares the rte buffers for signals having range check activated. DEPRECATED interface. The function needs to be called before any runnable call. its handles the status flags and last valid values.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the value and status of the signals configured as implicit. This function prohibits input signal to change their value while the SWC runnable is executed.

briefdescription.para: Contains macros and functions used to integrate rte light:

Source
RteLight_SWC_Integration.h Revision
version Author
author Date
date - declaration of queue initialization

Intended to be directly included by the SWCs' Task file. Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
